text:
DBI shall use best efforts to provide a publicly accessible and transparent permit tracking system as directed in this 
Chapter 78 no later than two (2) years from the effective date of this ordinance. In the event DBI does not provide such permit tracking system within such time period, the Board of Supervisors shall consider directing and funding another City department or provider to undertake such improvements to DBI's permit tracking system. 
(Added by Ord. 112-04, File No. 040539, App. 7/1/2004)
